section.p: The operator can specify default attributes for device as mentioned in the following table.
If Attach to Device parameter is true in the sub-templates, then the provisioned subscription is attached to this Device.

row.entry: This parameter indicates whether the overage is allowed. Select this check box to enable overage.
This parameter indicates whether an OCS over the Sy interface is enabled or not.
This parameter indicates the destination realm of OCS allowing you to select a specific OCS from a group of OCSs based on the subscriber device.
This parameter indicates the destination host of OCS allowing you to select a specific OCS from a group of OCSs based on the subscriber device.
This parameter indicates the name of the notification profile associated with the device.

entry.p: This parameter indicates the name of the lifecycle you want to associate with the device.
This parameter indicates the subscription index for the device.
This enables to add custom data dictionary to the device.
Click ADD CUSTOM DATA to add custom data to the Device.

row.entry: This parameter indicates the name of a custom data pre-configured in the custom data dictionary.
This parameter indicates the type that is not configurable and pre-configured in the custom data dictionary.
This parameter indicates the value for the type configured.
